name: @tokeny/trex-solidity
description: A fully compliant environment for the issuance and use of tokenized securities.

scripts.build: truffle compile && truffle-flattener contracts/token/Token.sol > build/TokenFlat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/registry/IdentityRegistry.sol > build/IdentityRegistryFlat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/registry/ClaimTopicsRegistry.sol > build/ClaimTopicsRegistryFlat.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/registry/TrustedIssuersRegistry.sol > build/TrustedIssuersRegistryFlat.sol

author: Tokeny Solutions
